Superman's Kryptonian parents, Zor-El and Alura, as they have the power to create a new world order.
A talking dragon named Scorch who can control fire and help humans harness its power for good.
The Greek goddess of wisdom, Athena, to bring wisdom and strategic thinking to modern-day politics.
The enigmatic and powerful Shadow from Neil Gaiman's "The Sandman" series, to uncover hidden truths and bring justice to the world.
The alien warrior princess, Lyra from Philip Pullman's "His Dark Materials" series, to fight against oppression and protect the innocent.
